title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request. It should either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run and pass false for the cancellable parameter.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open the debug perspective. 2) Go to the breakpoints pane. 3) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 4) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
